text: The Museo Camilo Egas is an Ecuadorian art museum about the modernist painter Camilo Egas. It was established in 1980 and located in Quito, Ecuador.Museo Camilo Egas Museo Camilo Egas == References == == See also == * List of museums in Ecuador Category:Museums in Quito Category:Art museums established in 1980 Category:Art museums and galleries in Ecuador
title: Museo Camilo Egas
